text: I Take This Woman is a 1940 drama movie. It is about a young woman who tries to commit suicide when an affair ends. Spencer Tracy plays Dr. Karl Decker. Hedy Lamarr plays Georgi. Laraine Day plays Linda Rogers. The movie was released in February 1940. Category:1940 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by W. S. Van Dyke Category:Movies directed by Frank Borzage
title: I Take This Woman
